home.title: Exceptional products at friendly prices
home.description: Offer your loved ones the opportunity to discover exceptional products, thanks to our group orders. Benefit from preferential rates, but also enjoy together the richness and authenticity of our terroirs.

layout.text: Savor the delights of local crafts together, in three simple steps
layout.text2: By creating an attractive ad where you define the price, give details of the products offered and introduce the artisan. All the information your potential buyers need.
layout.text4: Encourage them to explore the offer and place an order, all facilitated by an online platform. This is an opportunity to introduce them to new products.
layout.text6: This includes the preparation of the packages by the artisan and their delivery to you. Make sure that your loved ones receive the products under the best conditions.

header.text: Create, Share and Enjoy with a bulk order!
header.text1: In just a few clicks, create an order, invite your loved ones and share the pleasure of discovering together the unique flavors of local crafts. Take advantage of advantageous prices, support artisans in your region, and transform each purchase into a friendly and enriching experience.

breakpoint.text1: Embark on the adventure of artisanal flavors
breakpoint.text2: By joining our group order community, benefit from advantageous prices while sharing the pleasure of tasting the best of local crafts. Make each purchase a unique experience, supporting artisans and sharing moments with your loved ones.
breakpoint.text4: An enriching social experience, strengthening bonds with family and friends while discovering exceptional products together.
breakpoint.text5: Support and promotion of local artisans
breakpoint.text6: By favoring products from local crafts, you contribute to maintaining and promoting the unique know-how of our regions.
